title: Back to School WeWow Day 2
description:
It's Day 2 of our special Back to School Edition of WeWow! Bring your critical thinking skills to the Laboratory of Bad Ideas, because today we're identifying problems and solutions for recess! Then, check back tomorrow for even more projects you can tinker with like a real scientist.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
